main event: A witness observed a bright light in the sky near Mount Carmel, Pennsylvania on 8 January 1967.
interesting points: The object was reported to be round in shape and about the size of a basketball with a bright white light., It hovered for several minutes before accelerating rapidly and disappearing., The witness reported the sighting to the Pennsylvania State Police., No physical evidence or additional witnesses were found to corroborate the sighting., The case was ultimately filed as unidentified due to insufficient data.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: a civilian who observed the light while driving home from work
